Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
26.07.2012 GB SCR17464 Replaced UFB525 MagicConcat by GB730 AppendFile to build the final XML
02.05.2011 SH SCR16387 BXA054/3-1/2 replaced BPH122 by GB902
13.04.2011 GB SCR16261 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
05.02.2009 GB SCR Small technical change for UniPaaS
08.09.2005 SH SCR8998 BXA054/3 Uses GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE for (:60F:)
29.08.2005 SH SCR8964 BXA054/3 Uses now "C" if Totalamount <=0 else "D"
26.08.2005 SH SCR8934 BXA054/3 Extended ICPH selection with ICPH_BOOKINGDATE
<= GNRL_NIGHTPROGRAMSDATE
25.08.2005 SH SCR8912 BXA054/3/1 and .../3/2 Added call to BPH122 to recalculate
Amount from bank currency to client currency
22.08.2005 SH SCR8552 BXA054/3 fixed bug with signs of amounts
on 18.8.2005 WJ SCR8808 add a line in TEMP_BXA54_DESC
11.08.2005 SH SCR8552 Added new module BXA054/3 and restructured BXA054
according to the new requirements for BXA054/3
01.08.2005 MW SCR#8705 --> Changed PI:Attachment_Name in the BXA900-call
21.03.2005 SH SCR8024 Added test to skip producing of XML if not COUT exists
according to input parameter
11.03.2005 SH SCR7951 Changed output of BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR if
GNRL_BANKPOLICY = 'Y', then BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR has to be added
24.08.2004 SH SCR6878 Fixed bug in DSQL if BXA054 called from BXACALL
20.08.2004 SH SCR6725 Fixed bug from 19.08.2004, if PI.JOURNALNO = 0, then
BADP has to be selecetd with "and TX54_CURRENCY = PI.CURRENCY", removed
changes from 19.08.2004
19.08.2004 SH SCR6725 Fixed bug selection BADP if called from BXA054N, then
TX54_JOURNALNO has to be used for selection of BADP.
09.08.2004 SH SCR6725 Added new parameter PI.CURRENCY and extended selection of
TX54 rows with new field, see task "BADP exist if PI.JOURNALNO = 0"
19.05.2004 SH SCR6217 Restructured BXA054 --> Table BADP will be obtained with
DSQL now, because we have also to select TX54 rows now
If PI.JOURNALNO = 0, BXA054 was called from BXA054N , all BAPD rows have to be
selecetd where BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO = TX54_JOURNALNO of all selected TX54 rows
If PI.JOURNALNO >0, BXA054 was called from BXACALL, only BADP rows have to be
selected where BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO = PI.JOURNALNO
11.05.2004 SH SCR6183 BXA054/1 Skip the writing of the last remaining
description part if there is only a . (full stop)
04.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed argument list for BXA900, see SCR for details
01.03.2004 SH SCR5612 BXA054/1 Removed writing of +/- sign for amounts fields
09.02.2004 SH SCR5378 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ATTACHMENT_NAME (skip)
04.02.2004 SH SCR5444 BXA054/2 DTAUS Changed writing of client, use now all 5
- digits if client number >=1000 and only the last 3 digits of administration
- number; also done in BXA954/1 MT940
11.12.2003 SH SCR4925 Added new argument to BXA900 PI.ENCODING with
- COUT202_ASCIIFLETYPE
03.12.2003 SH SCR4915 BXA054/2 DTA --> Changed result database for DSQL in task
- "Totals BDPD rows" from TEMP to MEMORY, see SCR for details
16.06.2003 SH SCR3763 BXA054/1 MT940 --> Changed writing of F4 (BDPD_DESCRIPTION
15.04.2003 SH SCR3338 BXA054/1 MT940 removed thousand seperators
11.03.2003 SH SCR2566 Added to new arguments for GB007 if job is running on
- AS400 to turn job to message wait
07.11.2002 SH SCR2491 "BXA054/2 DTAUS" Changed updates of following fields:
C10 = BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR, C11 = BADP_BANKACCOUNTIDDEBTOR
29.10.2002 SH SCR2447 "BXA054/1 MT940" Built second version of writing BDPD rows
- to XM, write descriptions in one line (CR after 65 lines), the old version
-- created for every BDPD-row a separate line for XML Both versions are running
-- in the future in BXA054, at the moment only the new version is active
22.10.2002 SH SCR2393 Add new argument to end of list for call to BXA900
17.10.2002 SH Reporttype = MT9 fixed some bugs
10.02.2002 SH BXA054/1 implemented now
18.09.2002 SH Fixed some bugs for DTAUS
17.09.2002 SH Fixed some bugs for DTAUS
11.09.2002 SH Fixed some bugs of totals in record E for DTAUS
09.09.2002 SH Write every CDATA section between <row></row> tag for TYPE = DTA
05.09.2002 SH Write one CDATA section for every line for TYPE = DTA
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- needed for errorhandling
======= Build directories for TEMPLATES and OUTPUTDIRECTORIES =========
-- Use PI.OUTDIR as OutputDirectory for XML Files
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Directory for templates
-- Directory for temporary XML Files
-- Build FileNames for Templates
-- For Reporttype = 'DTA'
-- For Reporttype = 'MT9' or 'MTD'
-- 1. STEP --> Check for existing Template (s)
-- Validation of templates for reporttype = 'DTA'
-- Validation of templates for reporttype = 'MT9' or 'MTD'
-- 2. STEP --> Check for existing TempDirectory
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Produce XML only if client recieves 'DTA' or 'MT9' files, so if no COUT row
exist, skip the following block
... in case of report type = "MT9" or "DTA", check first if data is available
for the report, else no XML has to be produced
-- BXA054 was called from BXACALL
-- BXA054 was called from BXA054N
... in case of report type = 'MTD' the database selections for XML is different
(also for report type = 'MTD' a MT9 file has to be produced)
-- Only if data is available for XML produce an XML file
... calculate REPA_JOURNALNO
(in case of BXA054/3 the journal number is already calculated)
... store row to report archive
... prepare XML header and footer
-- Produce XML files for 'MT9' or 'DTA' or 'MTD'
-- For reporttype = 'MT9' or 'MTD'
-- For reporttype = 'DTA'
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- For reporttype = 'MT9' or 'MTD'
-- For reporttype = 'DTA'
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- allow deletion of the temporary record in calling programs BXACALL/BXA054N
-- Task stops if min. one BADP exists for which XML has to be produced
-- Batches (if rowtype = 2)
-- uses to make temp table rows unique
-- calc journal number uses to store temp tables and aslo for further XML
handling (only once at the beginning)
-- Bank payments
-- Batches
-- Domestic cheques
-- Foreign cheques
-- Manual bookings
... set variable to 'Y' to avoid double files
-- If more then 10 BDPD rows where TYPE = 2 exist in database the remaining
rows (max 4) have to be written with the "Feldschlüssel" = 60 - 63
-- Reset variables
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Recalculation to client currency
-- Key 00 --> first description where type = 3
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 20 - 29 --> descriptions where type = 2
-- If more then 10 BDPD rows where TYPE = 2 exist in database the remaining
rows (max 4) have to be written with the "Feldschlüssel" = 60 - 63
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 30 --> BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR
-- Key 31 --> BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR
-- Key 32 - 33 --> descriptions where type = 1
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
... extention (key=34) if rows for key 60 - 63 have to be stored
-- First 10 descriptions where type = 2 are already handeld, see part
"Description Key 20-29"
-- Key 60 - 63 --> descriptions where type = 2
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- If more then 10 BDPD rows where TYPE = 2 exist in database the remaining
rows (max 4) have to be written with the "Feldschlüssel" = 60 - 63
-- In case of existing BADP row, write same data to temp tables as
in "BXA054/3/1 Bank payments" but only for one payment
-- Write remaing BDPD rows (type = 2) if exists
-- If no BADP row exists, use ICPH fields to store temp tables
-- Only if a debtor heller is selected for the batch payment, store descriptions
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- PA54_AMOUNTC has to be recalculated to client currency if BTCP_BADP_ID > 0,
same as also done in BXA054/3/1
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 00 --> first description where type = 3
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 20 - 29 --> descriptions where type = 2
-- If more then 10 BDPD rows where TYPE = 2 exist in database the remaining
rows (max 4) have to be written with the "Feldschlüssel" = 60 - 63
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 30 --> BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR
-- Key 31 --> BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR
-- Key 32 - 33 --> descriptions where type = 1
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
... extention (key=34) if rows for key 60 - 63 have to be stored
-- First 10 descriptions where type = 2 are already handeld, see part
"Description Key 20-29"
-- Key 60 - 63 --> descriptions where type = 2
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Descriptions
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Descriptions
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 00 (11.08.2005 SH SCR8552 --> Disabled writing of key 00, could be
removed in the future if it's 100% sure that in case of manual bookings
never a string has to be written for key 00
-- Store manual booking text to temp table
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Key 20 - 29 --> first 10 descriptions
... extention (key=34) if rows for key 60 - 63 have to be stored, counter(0) >10
-- increase line no for every row which has to be stored to temp table
-- Produce MT940 for report type = MT9
-- Produce MT940 for report type = MTD
-- Produce DTAUS

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO, BADP_ID, BADP_BANK_CURRENCY, BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR, BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE, BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR, BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR FROM :1/badp, :1/tx54 WHERE TX54_ADMNO= :2 and TX54_CLNTNO = :3 and TX54_COUT_LINENO = :4 and BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO = TX54_JOURNALNO :5 order by BADP_ID FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: -- MT9-HEADER, will be written only once, could not be called from T.P.
-- because we need values from the current mainfile BADP
-- Build totals (different calculation according to GNRL_BANKCOSTSPOLICY)
-- Reset virtuals for next loop
-- String which contains the diff. descriptions, if the lenght of v.PRODUCED_
-- STRING will be >= than 65 the first 65 digits will be written to
-- v.STRING_TO_XML and will be deleted from v.PRODUCED_STRING
-- String which will be written to XML
-- The diff. descriptions will be separated by a "Feldschlüssel". The first part
-- included an '?' and the following part is a kind of sequenece number, given
-- by the germans banks.
-- So if the prefix has to be changed only the INIT has to be modified
-- TRUE --> If more then 10 BDPD rows exist and the third task "Write Feld-
-- schlüssel 60" has to be called
-- (Set to "True" in "Write Feldschlüssel 20-29")
-- Init with start-tag
-- Write remaining part of descriptions to XML; if only a . (full stop) has to
be written to XML then skip the writing, because a . (full stop) causes
problems with sending the file via email (the part below . (full stop) will
skipped by sevaral email programs
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- If more then 10 BDPD rows for TYPE = 2 exist in database the remaining
-- rows (max 4) have to be written with the "Feldschlüssel" = 60 - 63 with
-- task "Write Feldschlüssel 60"
-- Feldschlüssel 30 --> BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Feldschlüssel 31 --> BADP_BANKACCOOUNTDEBTOR
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Do not write the first 10 BDPD rows wtih TYPE = 2, already written in task
-- "Write Feldschlüssel 20-29"
-- "Textschlüsselergänzung", has to be written if more then 10 BDPD rows with
-- TYPE = 2 are in database
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits amd write part to XML

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO, BADP_BANKID, BADP_BANKACCOUNT, BADP_ID, BADP_BANK_CURRENCY, BADP_BANKIDDEBTOR, BADP_BANKACCOUNTDEBTOR, BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR, BADP_AMOUNTCOSTSACCCURR FROM :1/badp, :1/tx54 WHERE TX54_ADMNO= :2 and TX54_CLNTNO = :3 and TX54_COUT_LINENO = :4 and BADP_REPA_JOURNALNO = TX54_JOURNALNO :5 order by BADP_ID FOR FETCH ONLY

Text.val: RECORD C PART 1
RECORD C PART 2
RECORD C PART 3
RECORD E
-- Virtuals to calculate totals for record E
-- Build record E
-- mult with 100, no decimal point will be printed to XML
-- Build record A
-- Build record C
-- Calculate payment amount for output
-- Calculate totals for record E
-- calculate total of BADP_AMOUNTACCURR
-- Reset virtuals
-- The first record for every BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE (1,2,3) will be written to
-- a fix position in part C1/C2, the following descriptions will be written in
-- sequence to part C2 --> C19/C20/C21/C22 and into the
-- extended part of C 3-6
-- The second record for every BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE (1,3) have to be written
-- into the extended part of the C record. All other records for
-- BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE (1,3) have to be ignored.
-- Write last part, which was not written in the R.S., only relevant for the
-- last part, means last BDPD_DESCRIPTION
-- The first descriptions for every descritiontype (1,2,3) will be written to
-- a fixed position in part C1/C2
-- Only one record for BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE (1,3) could be written into the
-- extended variable part of the C record. If BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE (2) then
-- all (max. 15) descriptions coul be written into the extennded variable part
-- Start Block --> Part C2 already written (Write Part C 3-6)
-- Build part C3
-- Reset virtuals for next part
-- Build part C4
-- Reset virtuals for next part
-- Build part C5
-- Reset virtuals for next part
-- Build part C6
-- Reset virtuals for next part
-- End Block --> Part C2 already written (Write Part C 3-6)
-- End Block --> First record has been written
-- Remember which fields already written
DON'T MOVE THE SEQUENCE OF THE TWO FOLLOWING UPDATES
-- Only one record for BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE (1,3) could be written into the
-- extended variable part of the C record

SQL_STMT_U.val: select BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE from :1/bdpd where BDPD_BADP_ID=:2 FOR FETCH ONLY OPTIMIZE FOR 100 ROWS

Text.val: -- If some of the three counter = 0, we have to update them with 1 to calculate
-- the recordlenght for the c record. The first record of each group of types
-- are written into the constant part of record C.
-- It's only allowed to write one additional description (Type = 1/3) into the
-- extended variable part of the C record
-- Calculate the number of descriptions over all BDPD_DESCRIPTIONSTYPES
-- If v.NUMBDPD > 18 set 18, the maximum number of descriptions reached
-- Calculate fields in record C
-- get start balance
-- MT9-HEADER, will be written only once, could not be called from T.P.
-- because we need values from the current mainfile
... Init total amount for end balance (:62F:)
-- Build totals (different calculation according to GNRL_BANKCOSTSPOLICY)
-- Reset virtuals for next loop
-- String which contains the diff. descriptions, if the lenght of v.PRODUCED_
-- STRING will be >= than 65 the first 65 digits will be written to
-- v.STRING_TO_XML and will be deleted from v.PRODUCED_STRING
-- String which will be written to XML
-- The diff. descriptions will be separated by a "Feldschlüssel". The first part
-- included an '?' and the following part is a kind of sequenece number, given
-- by the germans banks.
-- So if the prefix has to be changed only the INIT has to be modified
-- Init with start tag
-- Write remaining part of descriptions to XML; if only a . (full stop) has to
be written to XML then skip the writing, because a . (full stop) causes
problems with sending the file via email (the part below . (full stop) will
skipped by sevaral email programs
-- Produce a CR & Line Feed after 65 digits and write part to XML
